algorithm_technique: Calculate net shift by summing/subtracting amounts, then apply modulo and slice string.
problem_summary_simple: Shift a string left or right multiple times and return the final string.
problem_summary_technical: Net shift calculation using modulo arithmetic on string length to optimize multiple shifts into one.
key_insights: Consolidating all shifts into a single net shift significantly optimizes the operation.
Modulo arithmetic is crucial for handling shifts that exceed the string length.
String slicing provides an efficient way to perform the final shift.
